constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: SASC Strategic Area of Special Character

description: Details required by Condition 4 (Car Parking), Condition 6 (Cycle Parking), Condition 7 (Refuse  Recycling Facilities) and Condition 8 (Landscaping Scheme) of Planning Permission 18/14732/FUL (Demolition of existing dwellinghouse and erection of two storey detached dwellinghouse with accommodation in the roofspace)
decision_conditions: In the absence of sufficient information with regards to the landscaping scheme, the proposal fails to demonstrate that the proposed development would be in the interests of visual amenity and would accord with Policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted 2012.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details have been assessed and are hereby approved, subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the approved details, in relation to Condition 22 (Biodiversity Net Gain) of planning permission 22/00574/FUL, which states:Within 6 months from the date of this permission, a scheme demonstrating how the maximum biodiversity net gain will be achieved on the site shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing. The scheme must include details of the proposed biodiversity/habitat enhancements (including maintenance arrangements).The approved scheme shall be implemented in full in accordance with timescales to be set out within the nature enhancement strategy and thereafter maintained in accordance with the approved details.Reason: To safeguard the biodiversity and nature conservation value of the site, in accordance with policy G6 of the London Plan 2021, Policies CS3 and DM6 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012 and the NPPF (2021).
Please provide the address of the owner/occupier of the adjoining neighbour to the rear.
